title: $:/plugins/OokTech/MomentaryPushButton
author: OokTech
name: MomentaryPushButton
description: A modification of the button widget that actions on mousedown and on release
readme:
<$button class="tc-btn-invisible" style="overflow: hidden;white-space: pre;width: 100%;" message="tm-open-external-window" param="https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-MomentaryPushButton">{{$:/core/images/github}} <$text text="https://github.com/OokTech/TW5-MomentaryPushButton"/></$button>

This is a widget that makes a button that does actions both on mousedown and mouseup
